modName: Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP
summary: Will make your female walk as if she is a fashion model on the stage. Now with Breast bouncing motion. v1.1 is the latest work
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13272-1-1332552414.jpg[/img]
Picture uploaded by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1512599]Atomic weasel[/url][/center]
[center][color=\"#FFFACD\"]UPDATES LOG[/color]
============
This mod Now added and updated inside [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29622]XP32 New Animation Package - Nexus Exclusive[/url]
Note: the latest haven\'t included in the pack

for ppl who want their own PC animation should look into [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14871]PC Exclusive Animation Path[/url]


[color=Yellow]VHH walk v1.2 Less Exaggerated Style for NMM installation[/color][color=Red][NEW!!][/color]
- Change the Breast motion to match with Natural breast animation [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6388722]by DarkAngel1265[/url]
- Less style for arms & hands motion
- Replace backward motion with vanilla motion(regular backward VHH as optional)

To enable BBP, you need 
- certain skeleton mod that support BBP
- Body mesh that support BBP

[color=pink]For Magic, torch and shield issues may visit [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]FNIS[/url]. Please endorse him for the file.[/color][/center]

[center]Recommend to use it with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1603]Skyrim Speed[/url], increase your walkspeed to 18%
at my video, I raise the walk more than 18%, around 100(+24,84%) and running 330(-10,81%)
[/center]
[center][youtube]VpiJxQ7TAF0[/youtube]  [youtube]x4V0S5rLCCk[/youtube] [/center]
[center][youtube]-fZ8VWTmrkA[/youtube] [youtube]YGtk3iJEv0o[/youtube] [/center]
[center]Video comparation uploaded by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2576694]waduk[/url][/center]
[center][youtube]DTbT2usDaVc[/youtube]                  [youtube]Am3Cum96kW4[/youtube] [/center]
[center][youtube]lBPh0aiAd20[/youtube]                    [youtube]nbm9lT9SfX4[/youtube][/center]

[center]Other vid [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xpnzjn_vhh-walk-with-bb_videogames]Here, Daily motion[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Z-FhpTbOQI ]Other New Vid[/url][/center]

[color=orange]LICENSING
=========
WHATEVER THE CIRCUMSTANCES, NEVER EVER PUT THIS MOD ON STEAM!! and don\'t ask me to put it on steam either.
[/center][/color]
author: xp32
